articles.description: F1 2023 launches June 16, 2023 for PlayStation 4, PS5, PC, Xbox One and Xbox Series X. The second chapter of the Braking Point narrative highlights this year’s game.
articles.content: Improvements to handling and throttle are under the hood; Braking Point 2 supplies the flashy livery

articles.title: Microsoft is forcing Outlook and Teams to open links in Edge and IT admins are angry - The Verge
